home.title: Job Applications Made
home.subtitle: Upload your CV, add job offers, and track your applications. Perfect for cleaning, factory, logistics, and hospitality workers.
home.uploadDescription: Upload your CV, diplomas, and references. We extract and organize everything automatically.
home.addJobsDescription: Paste a job URL and we'll analyze the requirements to match with your skills.
